alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Coast; Umpqua Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 25 at 1:50AM PDT until August 25 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR ABUNDANT LIGHTNING ON DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 615 AND 616... * IMPACTS...A higher threat of lightning ignited wild fires. Any fires that develop have a high probability of spreading rapidly. Abundant lightning can also ignite new fires and strain fire fighting resources. * AFFECTED AREA...FWZ 615 as well as western and central sections of FWZ 616... * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated to scattered high based storms that are likely to be mostly dry or have little precipitation. Lightning strikes outside of precipitation cores are likely and cause for concern. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts up to 35 mph. * DETAILED URL...View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Gather your fire evacuation kit now and familiarize yourself with your evacuation plan. Collect essentials you don`t want to lose and prioritize your checklist. Visit ready.gov/kit for more information.

area.areaDesc: South Central Oregon Coast; Umpqua Basin
